problem.markdown:
Complete this question to receive two points for the Prompted Discussion.
>>If you posted to the discussion and asked a question about at least one other post, choose “yes” below. If not, select “no” or return to the Prompted Discussion to complete the assignment. <<
[[(yes), no]]
problem.p: Complete this question to receive two points for the Prompted Discussion.
If you posted to the discussion and asked a question about at least one other post, choose “yes” below. If not, select “no” or return to the Prompted Discussion to complete the assignment.

optioninput.label: If you posted to the discussion and asked a question about at least one other post, choose “yes” below. If not, select “no” or return to the Prompted Discussion to complete the assignment.
